Title: Sons of Mars
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Ako Castuera, Patrick McHale (story by), Kent Osborne (story by), Pendleton Ward (story by), Douglas TenNapel (story), Jesse Moynihan (story by), Jesse Moynihan
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Tom Kenny, Pendleton Ward
Plot: Magic Man switches bodies with Jake so that he can escape his trial on Mars, leaving it up to Finn to reveal the truth and save his friend.
